citeinfo.title: MVTA Schedule Data - General Transit Feed Format

descript.abstract: These data include bus schedules for Minnesota Valley Transit Authority services in the south metro Twin Cities area. These data are published in the General (formerly Google) Transit Feed Specification format.
descript.purpose: This data set was developed to distribute MVTA bus schedule data to the Google Transit application and others utilizing the same data structures.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities metro area, specifically a subset of Dakota, Scott, Hennepin, and Ramsey Counties

timeperd.current: Includes schedule data from August 16, 2010 to December 3, 2010, including State Fair service and changes implemented on September 7 and September 11, 2010

place.placekey: Minneapolis, St. Paul, Apple Valley, Burnsville, Eagan, Rosemount, Savage, Dakota County, Scott County

idinfo.useconst:
By acceptance of these data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including disclaimers, whenever the user transmits or provides these data to another user.
We recommend these data be downloaded from the source (see below), not the DataFinder, for quality purposes.

attracc.attraccr: Attributes are accurate to within the tolerance of the tools used to measure them.

dataqual.complete: All areas served by Minnesota Valley Transit Authority bus service is included

horizpa.horizpar: Bus stops are located within the the tolerance of the associated measurement tools, including the TLG Street Centerline data, Google mapping tools, and portable GPS logging devices.

vertacc.vertaccr: bus stops are located within the tolerance of the associate measurement tools, including the TLG Street Centerline data, Google mapping tools, and portable GPS logging devices.

procstep.procdesc: Bus stops listings sourced from existing MVTA stop data. Schedule data from MVTA scheduling application.

overview.eadetcit: Attribute information is referenced to the General Transit Feed Specification maintained by Google Corp.

distinfo.distliab: Data are provided with no warranty, implied or explicit, as to performance or fitness for any purpose. Data are provided in compliance with the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Mn Stat. Ch. 13). Data are not warranted to be error free; suggested corrections to improve data quality should be provided to MVTA at the above addresses.

digtinfo.formname: .zip file containing comma-separated-value .txt files in conformance with General Transit Feed Specification

stdorder.ordering: Dataset available by clicking the link in the Online Linkage section, below, by downloading directly from the source at wiki.mvta.com/files/home/google_transit.zip, or by requesting a CD-ROM from the above contact addresses.
